Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.filter.ManifestBundleCategoryFilter
    since 2.0
    org.nuxeo.build.ant.OldVersion
    Since 1.14. Use org.nuxeo.connect.update.Version instead
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.IntegrationTestMojo.testFailureIgnore
    Since 2.0. Now never fail during integration-test and rely on verify for exception raise.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.filter.ManifestBundleCategoryFilter.accept(Artifact)
    prefer use of ManifestBundleCategoryFilter.accept(Node, boolean, boolean) as it remembers already parsed artifacts
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.filter.ManifestBundleCategoryFilter.accept(Node, boolean, boolean)
    2.0
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.graph.Graph.findFirst(String)
    Since 2.0.4. This method is not very interesting.
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.graph.Node.getAcceptedCategories()
    since 2.0
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.graph.Node.getParents()
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.graph.Node.isAcceptedCategory(List)
    since 2.0
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.VerifyMojo.isSkip()
    Since 2.0.3. Use VerifyMojo.isSkipITs() or VerifyMojo.isSkipTests()
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.VerifyMojo.isSkipExec()
    Since 2.0.3. Use VerifyMojo.isSkipITs() or VerifyMojo.isSkipTests()
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.graph.DependencyUtils.mavenToAether(Artifact)
    Since 2.0.4. Use RepositoryUtils.toArtifact(Artifact) instead.
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.graph.DependencyUtils.mavenToDependency(Artifact)
    Since 2.0.4. Use RepositoryUtils.toDependency(org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact, java.util.Collection) or RepositoryUtils.toDependency(org.apache.maven.model.Dependency, org.eclipse.aether.artifact.ArtifactTypeRegistry) instead
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.graph.DependencyUtils.resolve(Artifact)
    Prefer use of DependencyUtils.resolve(org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact)
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.graph.Node.setAcceptedCategory(char[])
    since 2.0
    org.nuxeo.build.ant.artifact.ArtifactPattern.setCategory(String)
    since 2.0
    org.nuxeo.build.ant.artifact.ResolveFile.setClassifier(String)
    since 1.8; put classifier in the key ("groupId:artifactId:version:type:classifier:scope")
    org.nuxeo.build.ant.artifact.ArtifactPattern.setDependsOnCategory(boolean)
    since 2.0
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.VerifyMojo.setSkip(boolean)
    Since 2.0.3. Use VerifyMojo.setSkipITs(boolean) or VerifyMojo.setSkipTests(boolean)
    org.nuxeo.build.maven.VerifyMojo.setSkipExec(boolean)
    Since 2.0.3. Use VerifyMojo.setSkipITs(boolean) or VerifyMojo.setSkipTests(boolean)
    org.nuxeo.build.ant.artifact.AttachArtifactTask.setTarget(String)
    since 2.0 Attach now only works on the current MavenProject
